user_query: I'm organizing a company event next month and I want to include some trending Likee videos to keep everyone engaged. Can you fetch all videos from the user 'TrendingVideos' and check if any of our employees are shadowbanned on Reddit?

TaskList.description: Fetch all videos from the Likee user 'TrendingVideos'.
Check if any of our employees are shadowbanned on Reddit using their usernames.
